Notes: A red cannon that periodically shoots a long burning flame that damages the player and compatible enemies upon contact. It cannot be destroyed through any means.

Obj_arg0.Name: Cannon Rotation
Obj_arg0.Description: The rotation of the cannon in degrees. Default is 0.

Obj_arg1.Name: Wait Time
Obj_arg1.Description: The time in frames before it starts shooting again. Default is 300.

Obj_arg2.Name: Shoot Time
Obj_arg2.Description: How long it will shoot its flame in frames. Default is 300.

SW_A.Description: If used, it will only be able to shoot its flame while this switch is activated.

Group.Description: Groups several other FirePressureRadiate instances. The one with the longest wait time becomes the "group leader". All instances will start shooting its flame once the group leader is ready.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene. Its special cutscene functor action makes it stop shooting its flame.
